item.title: Mentioned by South Asian Link
item.description:
Improving Community Infrastructure
Nina Grewal, Member of Parliament for Fleetwood—Port Kells, on behalf of the Lynne Yelich, Minister of State for Western Economic Diversification, announced support for improvements to the North Delta Community Park under the Harper Government's Community Infrastructure Improvement Fund (CIIF). “Our Government is committed to creating jobs, growth and long-term prosperity in our communities across Canada,” said Nina Grewal, MP for Fleetwood-Port Kells. “By investing $55,000 on building a pathway we ...

item.title: Mentioned by MarketWatch (press release)
item.description:
Harper Government Invests in Improvements to Delta's Community Infrastructure
DELTA, BRITISH COLUMBIA, Apr 11, 2013 (Marketwired via COMTEX) -- Today, Nina Grewal, Member of Parliament for Fleetwood-Port Kells, on behalf of the Honourable Lynne Yelich, Minister of State for Western Economic Diversification, announced support for improvements to the North Delta Community Park under the Harper Government's Community Infrastructure ... "Our Government is committed to creating jobs, growth and long-term prosperity in our communities across Canada," said MP Grewal.

item.title: Mentioned by DigitalJournal.com (press release)
item.description:
Harper Government Invests in Improvements to Delta's Community Infrastructure
DELTA, BRITISH COLUMBIA--(Marketwired - April 11, 2013) - Today, Nina Grewal, Member of Parliament for Fleetwood-Port Kells, on behalf of the Honourable Lynne Yelich, Minister of State for Western Economic Diversification, announced support for improvements to the North Delta Community Park under the Harper Government's Community Infrastructure Improvement Fund ... "Our Government is committed to creating jobs, growth and long-term prosperity in our communities across Canada," said MP Grewal.

item.title: Mentioned by CON Media (press release)
item.description:
Harper Government Invests in Improvements to Delta's Community Infrastructure - SYS
DELTA, BRITISH COLUMBIA -- (Marketwired) -- 04/11/13 -- Today, Nina Grewal, Member of Parliament for Fleetwood-Port Kells, on behalf of the Honourable Lynne Yelich, Minister of State for Western Economic Diversification, announced support for improvements to the North Delta Community Park under the Harper Government's Community Infrastructure Improvement Fund (CIIF). "Our Government is committed to creating jobs, growth and long-term prosperity in our communities across Canada," said MP Grewal.
